CHAT.comment: Dear Dad Hope you have a good trip! Love Amanda

MOT decides for Chi that the letter should be for Chi's father but Chi decides what it says. Mot spells out a lot of words for Chi even before Chi gets a chance to do it on her own. Mot reminds Chi to leave spaces between the words and to use capital letter when appropriate. Mot leaves for a short time at the end of the activity to make some coffee. Chi not asked to read letter back.

u.a: possibly talking about the cover to the pad of paper that has letters on it
MOT leaves the room to make coffee
EXP referring to the underline down to a swiggle that Chi puts under the word love
